Package mlflex

Interface Summary
ITest Classes that implement this interace can be used for unit-testing purposes.
 

Class Summary
AbstractDataProcessor This abstract class coordinates all tasks required to process raw data, store data after it has been processed, and describe the data.
AbstractDependentVariableDataProcessor This class is designed to provide generic functionality for all data processors that store dependent variables.
AbstractDependentVariableTransformer Dependent variables can be transformed before they are used in machine-learning analyses.
AbstractEnsemblePredictor ML-Flex supports ensemble-learning approaches for aggregating evidence from multiple classification predictions.
AbstractMachineLearner This class provides a template for classes that perform general machine-learning tasks.
AbstractMetadataProcessor This abstract class coordinates all tasks for processing, storing, and describing metadata.
AbstractResultMeasurer This class is used as a generic means to measure the effectiveness of a set of predictions.
AbstractSummarizer When multiple values for a given data point have been recorded, this class supports generic functionality for dealing with those multiple values.
AbstractTransformer After raw data values are retrieved from the raw data sources, classes that inherit from this class can be used to transform those values.
AbstractWeightedVoteCombiner Several of the ensemble/combiner approaches in ML-Flex have a common characteristic: they assign weights to individual predictions before making the combined prediction.
AggregateDataProcessor This class is a data processor that combines data values across multiple other data processors: all other data processors defined as independent variable data processors.
AnalysisFileCreator This class is used to transform data from the ML-Flex data format to the format that is required for external software components.
ArffDataProcessor This data processor class is designed to parse text files in the ARFF format.
ArffDependentVariableDataProcessor This data processor class is designed to parse text files in the ARFF format.
AucResultMeasurer This classes uses the area under the receiver operating characteristic curve as the metric for comparing models.
BigFileReader This utility class is designed to aid in the process of parsing (potentially large) text files.
C5Learner This class provides functionality for interfacing with the C5.0 Decision Trees software package.
ClassificationAlgorithm This class acts as a wrapper for performing classification tasks.
CommandLineClient This class is used to execute commands at the command.
Config This class is used to parse configuration values from configuration files.
ContinuousDependentVariableDiscretizationTransformer This transformer class is a wrapper around the ContinuousDependentVariableThresholdFinder class to transform a continuous dependent variable to a discrete one.
ContinuousDependentVariableThresholdFinder This class contains the logic necessary to empirically determine the "optimal" cutoff for converting a continuous dependent variable to a discrete dependent variable.
CrossValidationAssignments This class is designed to store information about which cross-validation fold each data instance is assigned to.
DataInstanceCollection This class is designed to store all data for a set of data instances.
DataTypes This class contains utility methods for determining whether String values can be converted to other data types.
DataValueMeta This class stores meta information about a single data point.
DataValues This class is designed to store key/value pairs and to provide convenience methods for dealing with key/value pairs.
Dates This class provides utility methods for handling dates in Java.
DelimitedDataProcessor This class enables the user to import data directly from delimited (for example, by tabs or commas) text files.
DelimitedDependentVariableDataProcessor This class enables the user to import data directly from delimited (for example, by tabs or commas) text files.
DescriptionFileSaver  
EnsemblePredictionInfo This class stores prediction information about individual predictions that can then be used for making ensemble predictions.
EnsemblePredictionInfos This class stores a list of CombinedPredictionInfo objects that can be used for making ensemble/combined predictions.
EvaluationMetrics This class contains logic for various methods of evaluating classification performance.
Experiment This class contains high-level commands for executing tasks within a given experiment.
FasterArrayList<E> Resizable-array implementation of the List interface.
FeatureEvaluator This class coordinates the process of selecting/ranking features for each combination of data processor, feature-selection algorithm, and cross-validation fold.
FeatureRank This class contains information about how highly a feature (data point) was ranked by a given feature selection/ranking approach.
FeatureRanks This class contains logic for summarizing how features are ranked across multiple repetitions (for example, across multiple cross-validation folds).
FeatureSelectionAlgorithm This class acts as a wrapper for performing feature-selection tasks.
Files This class provides utility methods for reading, writing, updating, and deleting files.
GetFirstSummarizer When multiple values are present for a given data point, this summarizer simply returns the first value encountered.
InstanceVault This class provides convenience methods for accessing information about data instances that are used for machine-learning analyses.
KappaResultMeasurer This result measure uses the "kappa" value.
Lists This class contains utility methods for dealing with Java collections and lists.
LockedCallable<V> This class encapsulates objects necessary to run tasks in parallel across multiple compute nodes.
Log This class contains methods for logging information about ML-Flex execution.
LogRankStatisticResultMeasurer This class compares Predictions based on the log-rank statistic that is used for survival analyses.
Main This is the class that gets invoked when ML-Flex begins to execute.
MajorityVoteEnsemblePredictor This class represents an ensemble/combiner approach that forms an aggregate prediction based on a majority vote on the individual predictions.
Maps This class contains utility methods for dealing with Map objects.
MathUtility This class contains utility methods for performing mathematic operations.
MaxAbsoluteValueSummarizer When multiple values are specified for a single data point, this summarizer uses the maximum absolute value as the summarized value.
MaxProbabilityEnsemblePredictor This class represents an ensemble/combiner approach that computes the combined prediction according to the class probabilities that were assigned for each individual prediction.
MeanProbabilityEnsemblePredictor This class represents an ensemble/combiner approach that computes the combined prediction according to the class probabilities that were assigned for each individual prediction.
MeanSummarizer When multiple values exist for a given data point, this summarizer uses the mean of the values as the summarized value.
MedianContinuousDependentVariableTransformer When the dependent variable contains continuous values, this class transforms those values to discrete values, depending on whether each value is higher or lower than the median value.
ModelPrediction This is a wrapper class.
ModelPredictions This is a wrapper class.
ModelSelector This class is used to help determine which "model" is best for a given data processor, feature-selection algorith, and classification algorithm.
MultiThreadedTaskHandler This class encapsulates logic for executing computational tasks across one or more threads.
NullDependentVariableTransformer This class is used when no transformation is required on the dependent variable.
NullTransformer This class is used when no transformation is required on the data value.
NumericString This class was designed with the purpose of allowing strings to be sorted properly when they contain numeric values.
OrangeLearner This class provides an interface into the Orange machine-learning software package.
Prediction This class stores information about a prediction that has been for the dependent variable of a given data instance.
PredictionEvaluator This class contains logic for evaluating classification models.
PredictionResults This class provides support for evaluating a set of predictions that have been made and for summarizing the performance of the predictions using various metrics.
Predictions This class stores information about multiple predictions that have been made.
PredictiveValueWeightedVoteEnsemblePredictor The ensemble/combiner approach represented in this class uses the "predictive value" for the specified dependent-variable value to determine weights.
ProcessorVault This class provides convenience methods to access instances of data processors.
RandomDataProcessor This data processor generates data randomly.
RandomDependentVariableDataProcessor This data processor generates data randomly.
RandomMachineLearner This class can be used to randomly select features or to randomly assign instances to a given class.
RawDataInstanceCollection This class is used to store raw data.
ResultsSaver This class has functionality to save results from machine-learning analyses.
RLearner This class contains utility methods for interacting with the R Project software via command-line calls.
ScalarValue A scalar result represents a single value that can be recorded to evaluate how ML-Flex has performed or to describe the data used for the predictions.
SelectBestEnsemblePredictor This class represents an ensemble/combiner approach that computes the combined prediction according to the performance attained in the inner cross-validation folds.
Settings This class stores application wide values.
SimpleWeightedMeanProbabilityEnsemblePredictor This class represents an ensemble/combiner approach that computes the combined prediction according to the class probabilities that were assigned for each individual prediction.
SimpleWeightedVoteEnsemblePredictor This weight-based ensemble-learning approaches uses the weight assigned to each individual prediction.
SingleVariableLearner This learner can be used for validation purposes.
SpecificValueDependentValueTransformer When the dependent variable is continuous, it can be transformed to a discrete value.
SquaredWeightedVoteEnsemblePredictor This weight-based ensemble-learning approaches uses the "squared weight" assigned to each individual prediction.
StackedEnsemblePredictor This class implements the "stacked combiner" approach ensemble learning.
Survival This class stores survival information for a particular data instances.
SurvivalGroups This class stores survival information that can be used for calculation of survival statistics.
SurvivalHelper This class contains utility methods to support survival analyses.
Survivals This class stores survival values that can then be used to calculate survival statistics.
Tests This class is designed to execute all tests that are written to test low-level functionality in ML-Flex.
TrainTestValidationAssignments This class stores assignments of data instances to either training or testing groups.
Utilities This class contains general-purpose utility methods that are used in various places throughout the code.
WekaInMemoryLearner This class interfaces directly with the application programming interface of the Weka machine-learning software package.
WekaLearner This class interfaces directly with the application programming interface of the Weka machine-learning software package.
WildCardFileFilter This class is used when it is necessary to search the file system using wildcard file names.
WildCardFilenameFilter This class is used when it is necessary to search the file system using wildcard file names.
 

Enum Summary
Action This enumeration specified high-level actions that can be completed within an experiment.
AnalysisFileCreator.Extension These represent file extensions
ContinuousDependentVariableThresholdFinder.Metric This enum supports specification of any of a number of metrics to be used in determining the optimal threshold.
GeneralDataType This enumeration lists general categories of data types.
